page.title: 17SOUTH WINGFIELD-EDUCATION
page.content: The{Pre-School Playgroup}meets on Tues day and Thursday mornings in the Parish Rooms. Children may attend from the age of 3 years old and about 15 go to each session. Mothers who assist pay a reduced fee. In the term preceeding their fifth birthday children go to{South {Wingfield Primary School.}They attend part-time for the first term,usually afternoons,commencing full-time the following term. The school has about 75 chilren on roll,3 full-time teachers including the Headteacher and 1 part-time teacher and also employs 7 ancilliary staff. The school building is 110 years old. At 11 years old the children transfer to{Mortimer Wilson School}in Alfreton which is an 11-18 comprehensive school with about 1,600 pupils. The L.E.A. provides free buses for this journey.
